General.Name: Zibo Qixiang Tengda Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zibo Qixiang Tengda Chemical Co., Ltd manufactures and sells chemical products in China and internationally. The company's products include methyl ethyl ketone, maleic anhydride, propylene, rubber, butadiene, methyl methacrylate, nitrile latex, tert-butanol, isooctane, MTBE, petroleum, chemical catalysts, and other products. It is also involved in supply chain management business of chemical products; and trading of energy. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zibo, China. Zibo Qixiang Tengda Chemical Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Shandong Energy Group New Material Co., Ltd.
